episodes.title: A Review of Options Basics
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: Join Dan Passarelli, a highly regarded industry professional, as he reviews basic options concepts and terminology to kick off the series, "Advanced Options for the Experienced Investor."

episodes.title: A Review of Options Basics
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: Join Dan Passarelli, a highly regarded industry professional, as he reviews basic options concepts and terminology to kick off the series, "Advanced Options for the Experienced Investor."

episodes.title: Options Pricing and Price Behavior
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: This podcast features a discussion about various concepts that can have a significant effect on pricing behavior and how terms such as implied volatility and delta can greatly impact how an option price responds in the marketplace.

episodes.title: Options Pricing and Price Behavior
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: This podcast features a discussion about various concepts that can have a significant effect on pricing behavior and how terms such as implied volatility and delta can greatly impact how an option price responds in the marketplace.

episodes.title: The Options Investigator Demonstration
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: OIC's Options Investigator is an interactive software program that allows you to "test before you invest" and chart performance under various market conditions. This podcast is a guide on how to use this free tool to calculate theoretical values and develop realistic expectations of what may occur given certain price changes.

episodes.title: The Options Investigator Demonstration
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: OIC's Options Investigator is an interactive software program that allows you to "test before you invest" and chart performance under various market conditions. This podcast is a guide on how to use this free tool to calculate theoretical values and develop realistic expectations of what may occur given certain price changes.

episodes.title: Buying Calls
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: This podcast provides a review of essential strategies to consider when buying calls and delves into some advanced strategy selection concepts that will help investors make sound decisions when purchasing a call.

episodes.title: Buying Calls
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: This podcast provides a review of essential strategies to consider when buying calls and delves into some advanced strategy selection concepts that will help investors make sound decisions when purchasing a call.

episodes.title: Selling Puts
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: In this podcast, you’ll learn about the advantages and limitations of selling puts as a strategy for trading options. By understanding the risks and rewards of using techniques such as selling a put for income or trading on a cash-secured put, you’ll gain better insight into how selling puts can impact your potential return.

episodes.title: Selling Puts
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: In this podcast, you’ll learn about the advantages and limitations of selling puts as a strategy for trading options. By understanding the risks and rewards of using techniques such as selling a put for income or trading on a cash-secured put, you’ll gain better insight into how selling puts can impact your potential return.

episodes.title: Long Call versus Debit and Credit Spreads
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: Do you have a bullish outlook on a particular option, but want to better understand which approach can help maximize your profit potential? Podcast #6 of the Advanced series, “Long Call versus Debit and Credit Spreads” discusses the different types of vertical spreads to consider when using a bullish strategy. You’ll also learn about how long call and short put spreads compare and contrast with debit and credit spreads.

episodes.title: Long Call versus Debit and Credit Spreads
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: Do you have a bullish outlook on a particular option, but want to better understand which approach can help maximize your profit potential? Podcast #6 of the Advanced series, “Long Call versus Debit and Credit Spreads” discusses the different types of vertical spreads to consider when using a bullish strategy. You’ll also learn about how long call and short put spreads compare and contrast with debit and credit spreads.

episodes.title: Income Strategies, Part I
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: The first half of this two-part podcast compares income strategies for writing covered calls versus selling in-the-money and out-of-the money puts.

episodes.title: Income Strategies, Part I
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: The first half of this two-part podcast compares income strategies for writing covered calls versus selling in-the-money and out-of-the money puts.

episodes.title: Income Strategies, Part II
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: Part two takes an in-depth look at what strategies to consider given certain market conditions. You’ll also learn about the potential benefits and pitfalls of using calendar spreads as an income strategy.

episodes.title: Income Strategies, Part II
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: Part two takes an in-depth look at what strategies to consider given certain market conditions. You’ll also learn about the potential benefits and pitfalls of using calendar spreads as an income strategy.

episodes.title: Managing the Product: Strategic Alternatives to Inaction, Part I
episodes.author: The Options Industry Council
episodes.summary: In these final two podcasts of the Advanced series, you’ll find out about some alternatives to consider if an option position doesn’t work in your favor. Learn about the advantages and disadvantages of using strategies like putting on a collar, rolling up on a trade or creating a spread as a way to protect your investment.

episodes.title: Life Stories of Options Trading
